name: go-live-check
description: Validate the app is buildable and testable for deployment; focus only on blockers.
content:
Goal: determine whether this repo is ready to deploy.

Required checks:
- `npm run build`
- `npm test -- --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless`

Rules:
- Treat build failures or test failures as blockers.
- Do not expand scope beyond resolving blockers.
- If `npm audit` reports issues in dev tooling, mention them but do not block go-live unless explicitly asked.

Output:
- PASS/FAIL
- Exact failing command(s) and error(s)
- Minimal fix plan (or applied fix summary)
